message.content:
1. Stroke volume index (SVI) was measured preoperatively in group 1.
2. The preoperative SVI in group 1 was 29±10mL/m2.
3. Stroke volume index (SVI) was measured in the early postoperative period in group 1.
4. The early postoperative SVI in group 1 was 22±14mL/m2.
5. The SVI decreased from the preoperative period to the early postoperative period in group 1.

messages.content:
Statement: Stroke volume index (SVI) decreased from 29±10mL/m2 preoperatively to 22±14mL/m2 in the early postoperative period in group 1.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
